definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to force/to compel/to approach or go towards/urgent/pressing
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: qiang3 po4 xing4 chu3 wu4 zheng4
qiang3 po4 xing4 xing4 xing2 wei2

sentences.english: There's a compulsive problem to working at a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 在餐厅工作会有一个强迫性问题。

sentences.english: Her company misunderstands loyalty as forced conformity to the majority opinion.
sentences.chinese: 她的上司把忠诚理解为对于主流观念的强迫性服从。

sentences.english: Therapy and counseling can cure compulsive lying.
sentences.chinese: 而强迫性说谎是可以借由心理疗法及谘商来治疗。

sentences.english: Important things to avoid, such as aggravating disputants or imposing improper blocks, will be shared.
sentences.chinese: 最忌讳的就是加重激怒争论者或强迫性的冻结。

sentences.english: Some people also suffer from a disorder known as compulsive lying.
sentences.chinese: 有些人遭受一种叫做“强迫性说谎”的疾病。

sentences.english: It's almost an obsessive-compulsive desire to be the best.
sentences.chinese: 想要成为最好简直是一种强迫性的愿望。

sentences.english: China has a one-child-per-family policy that is not always enforced.
sentences.chinese: 中国的“每个家庭只生一胎”政策不总是强迫性的。

sentences.english: The threats of prosecution and persecution have usually been enough to keep polygamists subdued. But lately they are becoming emboldened.
sentences.chinese: 滥交和强迫性行为只是一夫多妻制最显见的危害所在。

sentences.english: A lot of Mike's compulsions involve cars.
sentences.chinese: 迈克有很多强迫性症状都与汽车相关。

sentences.english: Objective To study the efficacy of Zhong Youbin's psychoanalytic therapy in the treatment of patients with attentive disorders of OCD.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨认识领悟疗法对强迫性注意障碍的治疗作用。
他观察到，“你们都有强迫性。”

sentences.english: Occult depressed patients before have compulsive and hysteria disease characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 隐匿性抑郁症患者病前有强迫性和癔病性格特征。

sentences.english: Since I was 12 years old, I've suffered with a condition called Compulsive Hair Pulling.
sentences.chinese: 12岁以来，我就一直遭受着强迫性拔毛症的折磨。

pinyin: qiang3 po4 xing4 xing4 xing2 wei2
bian1 yuan2 xing4 ren2 ge2 zhang4 ai4
